verbs.description: suny poly [V: has] been walking away from real estate albany as officials at suny polytechnic institute have been working to stabilize the school finances and prop up its various economic development projects across upstate it has also been writing off millions of dollars in real estate and equipment that has lost value in recent years suny poly empire state development corporation
